contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox bodybuilder | image = | name = Yolanda Hughes | image_size = | caption = | nickname = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1963|10|30}} | birth_place = [[Murfreesboro, Tennessee]], [[United States]] | death_date = | death_place = | height = {{convert|5|ft|6+1/2|in|m|sigfig=3|abbr=on}} | weight = (In Season) 140-145 lbs. <br> (Off-Season)155-164 lbs. | firstproshow = IFBB World Amateur Championships | firstproshowyear = 1991 | bestwin = [[Ms. International]] | bestwinyear = 1997 and 1998 | predecessor = [[Kim Chizevsky]] | successor = [[Vickie Gates]] | yesorretiredyear = Retired 1999 }} '''Yolanda Hughes''' is a professional [[female bodybuilding|female bodybuilder]] from the [[United States]]. ==Biography== Yolanda was born in [[Murfreesboro, Tennessee]] on October 30, 1963. At a height of 5'6Â½", she competed as a heavyweight as an amateur. She earned her pro card by winning the World Amateur championship in 1992. She spent several years living in Germany, where she met her husband, Thomas Heying. After moving back to the US in the mid-1990s, they settled in Bellingham, Wa., where they still live. As a professional, her greatest success was winning consecutive [[Ms. International]] titles in 1997 and 1998. She competed in six [[Ms. Olympia]] contests, placing second to Kim Chizevsky at the 1998 Ms O, which was held in Prague in the Czech Republic that year (the only time it has been held outside North America). Yolanda also had a cameo in the 2002 movie ''Rollerball''. Recently Hughes opened a special training studio called Fitness Exotica in which she offers training and dance lessons to customers. == Contest history == *1984 [[National Physique Committee|NPC]] Ironmaiden - 2nd (HW) *1988 NPC Los Angeles Championship - 2nd (HW) *1988 NPC Orange County Classic - 1st (HW & Overall) *1988 NPC USA Championship - 6th (HW) *1989 NPC USA Championship - 5th (HW) *1990 NPC USA Championship - 4th (HW) *1990 NPC Nationals - 3rd (HW) *1991 NPC USA Championship - 2nd (HW) *1991 NPC Nationals - 3rd (HW) *1991 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] World Amateur - 2nd (HW) *1992 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] World Amateur - 1st (HW) *1992 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 8th *1993 [[Ms. International]] - 5th *1993 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 11th *1994 [[Ms. International]] - 3rd *1994 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 8th *1995 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 10th *1996 [[Ms. International]] - 4th *1997 [[Ms. International]] - 1st *1997 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 3rd *1998 [[Ms. International]] - 1st *1998 [[International Federation of BodyBuilders|IFBB]] [[Ms. Olympia]] - 2nd *1999 [[Ms. International]] - 3rd ==References== <div class="references-small"> *{{cite web | last = Schiller | first = Heidi | authorlink = | coauthors = | date = | year = 2005 | month = | url = http://thebellinghambusinessjournal.com/september_06/births.html | title = Fitness Exotica Owner: Yolanda Hughes | work = | pages = 1 | publisher = ''The Bellingham Business Journal'' | accessdate = 2007-09-28 | curly = |archiveurl = http://web.archive.org/web/20080312085843/http://www.thebellinghambusinessjournal.com/september_06/births.html <!-- Bot retrieved archive --> |archivedate = 2008-03-12}}</div> ==External links== *[http://www.bodybuilders.com/yolanda.htm Yolanda Hughes] *[http://www.fitnessexotica.com/ Yolanda Hughes Fitness Exotica] {{S-start}} | colspan = 3 align = center | '''[[Ms. International]]''' |- | width = 30% align = center | Preceded by:<br/>'''[[Kim Chizevsky]]''' | width = 40% align = center | First (1997) | width = 30% align = center | Succeeded by:<br/>'''Herself''' |- | width = 30% align = center | Preceded by:<br/>'''Herself''' | width = 40% align = center | Second (1998) | width = 30% align = center | Succeeded by:<br/>'''[[Vickie Gates]]''' {{S-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Hughes, Yolanda | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American bodybuilder | DATE OF BIRTH = 1963-10-30 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Murfreesboro, Tennessee]], [[United States]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hughes, Yolanda}} [[Category:1963 births]] [[Category:Professional bodybuilders]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:African-American female bodybuilders]] {{US-sport-bio-stub}} {{Bodybuilding-bio-stub}}
